page.title: 16Adult Education in K.Sutton
page.content: Many people go to the Adult Education classes. There are Keep Fit classes for men, women and the over 50's, Self Defence, Yoga and "Fight the Flab", the catch phrase of popular Radio and TV personality Terry Wogan. At Ballroom Dancing you can learn the waltz and quickstep and there are tap and folk-dancing sessions too. Less strenuous classes include learning to play Bridge, micro-wave cooking, cake-icing, sewing, art, flower-arranging and French Conversation. Most of the classes take place in the School or the Baptist Rooms. They usually happen on week-day afternoons or evenings and last for one to two hours; the courses are usually for 10 - 13 weeks.
